Terms and Conditions

  1. Suppliers must respect and comply with all applicable local and international laws, regulations and relevant industry codes when working with us and in the countries in which they operate.
  2. Suppliers must keep information relating to ourselves and our clients strictly confidential and secure. All paper and electronic records must be kept secure, and security measures must be in place to prevent unauthorized access to systems containing our information or that of our clients
  3. Suppliers must comply with all relevant local health and safety laws and regulations and generally offer a work environment that is safe, conducive to good health
  4. The invoices issued must show the actual price of the goods described and the supplier undertakes that all particulars are true and correct
